00042 /*
00043  * Get the grid from the parameters.
00044  */
00045 GridCoordinatesType CELConversionUtilities::GetGrid(CelFileData &inFile)
00046 {
00047         GridCoordinatesType grid;
00048         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00049 
00050         grid.lowerleft.x = grid.lowerleft.y = 0;
00051         grid.upperleft.x = grid.upperleft.y = 0;
00052         grid.lowerright.x = grid.lowerright.y = 0;
00053         grid.upperright.x = grid.upperright.y = 0;
00054 
00055         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDULX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00056                 grid.upperleft.x = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00057 
00058         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDULY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00059                 grid.upperleft.y = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00060 
00061         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDURX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00062                 grid.upperright.x = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00063 
00064         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDURY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00065                 grid.upperright.y = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00066 
00067         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLRX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00068                 grid.lowerright.x = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00069 
00070         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLRY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00071                 grid.lowerright.y = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00072 
00073         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLLX_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00074                 grid.lowerleft.x = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00075 
00076         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(GRIDLLY_PARAM_NAME, nvt) && nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00077                 grid.lowerleft.y = (int) nvt.GetValueFloat();
00078 
00079         return grid;
00080 }

00082 /*
00083  * Get the DAT header from the DAT file header object.
00084  */
00085 string CELConversionUtilities::GetDatHeader(CelFileData &inFile)
00086 {
00087         std::wstring datHeader;
00088 
00089         GenDataHdrVectorIt begin, end; 
00090         inFile.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->GetParentIterators(begin, end);
00091 
00092         // Find the DAT generic header
00093         for (GenDataHdrVectorIt ii = begin; ii != end; ++ii)
00094         {
00095                 std::string s = ii->GetFileTypeId();
00096                 if (ii->GetFileTypeId() == SCAN_ACQUISITION_DATA_TYPE)
00097                 {
00098 
00099                         // found the right header, now look for the parameter
00100                         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00101                         if (ii->FindNameValParam(DAT_HEADER_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00102                         {
00103                                 if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::TextType)
00104                                         datHeader = nvt.GetValueText();
00105                         }
00106                         else if (ii->FindNameValParam(PARTIAL_DAT_HEADER_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00107                         {
00108                                 if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::TextType)
00109                                 {
00110                                         std::wstring partialDatHeader = nvt.GetValueText();
00111 
00112                                         u_int16_t min = 0;
00113                                         u_int16_t max = 0;
00114 
00115                                         // Find the max and min parameters and append to the string.
00116                                         if (ii->FindNameValParam(MAX_PIXEL_INTENSITY_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00117                                         {
00118                                                 if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type)
00119                                                         max = nvt.GetValueUInt16();
00120                                         }
00121 
00122                                         if (ii->FindNameValParam(MIN_PIXEL_INTENSITY_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00123                                         {
00124                                                 if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type)
00125                                                         min = nvt.GetValueUInt16();
00126                                         }
00127 
00128                                         wchar_t buf[30];
00129                                         FormatString2(buf, 30, L"[%d..%d]", min, max);
00130                                         datHeader = buf;
00131                                         datHeader += partialDatHeader;
00132                                 }
00133                         }
00134                         break;
00135                 }
00136         }
00137         return StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(datHeader);
00138 }

00140 /*
00141  * Copy the file contents.
00142  */
00143 bool CELConversionUtilities::Copy(CelFileData &inFile, CCELFileData &outFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00144 {
00145         // Set the dimensions
00146         outFile.SetDimensions(inFile.GetRows(), inFile.GetCols());
00147 
00148         // Set the intensities, stdv and pixels
00149         FloatVector values;
00150         int n = inFile.GetNumCells();
00151         inFile.GetIntensities(0, n, values);
00152         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00153         {
00154                 outFile.SetIntensity(i, values[i]);
00155         }
00156         values.clear();
00157         inFile.GetStdev(0, n, values);
00158         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00159         {
00160                 outFile.SetStdv(i, values[i]);
00161         }
00162         Int16Vector pixels;
00163         inFile.GetNumPixels(0, n, pixels);
00164         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00165         {
00166                 outFile.SetPixels(i, pixels[i]);
00167         }
00168 
00169         // Set the outliers and masks.
00170         XYCoordVector xy;
00171         inFile.GetOutlierCoords(xy);
00172         n = (int) xy.size();
00173         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00174         {
00175                 outFile.SetOutlier(xy[i].xCoord, xy[i].yCoord, true);
00176         }
00177         xy.clear();
00178         inFile.GetMaskedCoords(xy);
00179         n = (int) xy.size();
00180         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00181         {
00182                 outFile.SetMask(xy[i].xCoord, xy[i].yCoord, true);
00183         }
00184 
00185 
00186         // Set the header.
00187         outFile.SetGridCorners(GetGrid(inFile));
00188     if((options != NULL)&&(options->m_ChipType != NULL)) 
00189     {
00190             outFile.SetChipType(options->m_ChipType);
00191     } 
00192     else 
00193     {
00194             outFile.SetChipType(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(inFile.GetArrayType()).c_str());
00195     }
00196 
00197         // Make sure the algorithm name is "Percentile" so it can import into GCOS.
00198         outFile.SetAlgorithmName("Percentile");
00199         //outFile.SetAlgorithmName(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(inFile.GetAlgorithmName()).c_str());
00200 
00201         // Add the first four algorithm parameters required by GCOS.
00202         FindAndAddAlgorithmParameter("Percentile", "75", inFile, outFile);
00203         FindAndAddAlgorithmParameter("CellMargin", "2", inFile, outFile);
00204         FindAndAddAlgorithmParameter("OutlierHigh", "1.500", inFile, outFile);
00205         FindAndAddAlgorithmParameter("OutlierLow", "1.004", inFile, outFile);
00206 
00207         // Set the CellMargin
00208         SetCellMargin(inFile, outFile, 2);
00209 
00210         ParameterNameValueTypeVector algParams;
00211         inFile.GetAlgorithmParameters(algParams);
00212         n = (int) algParams.size();
00213         string tag;
00214         string value;
00215         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00216         {
00217                 tag = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(algParams[i].GetName());
00218                 value = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(algParams[i].ToString());
00219 
00220                 // Filter the first four required GCOS algorithm parameters.
00221                 if (tag == "Percentile" || tag == "CellMargin" || tag == "OutlierHigh" || tag == "OutlierLow")
00222                 {
00223                         continue;
00224                 }
00225 
00226                 // Don't include the grid parameters added by the converter.
00227                 if (tag.length() > strlen("Grid") && strncmp(tag.c_str(), "Grid", strlen("Grid")) == 0)
00228                         continue;
00229 
00230                 // Add the parameter;
00231                 outFile.AddAlgorithmParameter(tag.c_str(), value.c_str());
00232         }
00233     if((options != NULL)&&(options->m_DATFileName != NULL)) 
00234     {
00235         std::string datHeader = CELFileConversionOptions::newDatName(GetDatHeader(inFile).c_str(), options->m_DATFileName);
00236         if(datHeader == "") 
00237         {
00238             return false;
00239         }
00240         else
00241         {
00242                 outFile.GetHeader().SetDatHeader(datHeader.c_str());
00243         }
00244     }
00245     else
00246     {
00247             outFile.GetHeader().SetDatHeader(GetDatHeader(inFile).c_str());
00248     }
00249         outFile.GetHeader().SetHeader(outFile.GetHeader().GetHeader().c_str());
00250 
00251     return true;
00252 }
00253 
00254 /*
00255  * Copy the file contents.
00256  */
00257 bool CELConversionUtilities::Copy(CCELFileData &inFile, CCELFileData &outFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00258 {
00259         // Set and dimensions
00260         outFile.SetDimensions(inFile.GetRows(), inFile.GetCols());
00261 
00262         // Set the entries
00263         int n = inFile.GetNumCells();
00264         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00265         {
00266         // Using GetEntry and SetCellEntry
00267         // causes problems on OS-X PPC
00268                 outFile.SetIntensity(i,inFile.GetIntensity(i));
00269                 outFile.SetStdv(i,inFile.GetStdv(i));
00270                 outFile.SetPixels(i,inFile.GetPixels(i));
00271                 if (inFile.IsOutlier(i) == true)
00272                         outFile.SetOutlier(i, true);
00273                 if (inFile.IsMasked(i) == true)
00274                         outFile.SetMask(i, true);
00275         }
00276 
00277         // Set the header.
00278         outFile.SetGridCorners(inFile.GetGridCorners());
00279     if((options != NULL)&&(options->m_ChipType != NULL)) 
00280     {
00281             outFile.SetChipType(options->m_ChipType);
00282     } 
00283     else
00284     {
00285             outFile.SetChipType(inFile.GetChipType().c_str());
00286     }
00287         outFile.SetAlgorithmName(inFile.GetAlg().c_str());
00288         n = inFile.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters();
00289         string tag;
00290         string value;
00291         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00292         {
00293                 tag = inFile.GetAlgorithmParameterTag(i);
00294                 value = inFile.GetAlgorithmParameter(tag.c_str());
00295                 outFile.AddAlgorithmParameter(tag.c_str(), value.c_str());
00296         }
00297     if((options != NULL)&&(options->m_DATFileName != NULL)) 
00298     {
00299         std::string datHeader = CELFileConversionOptions::newDatName(inFile.GetHeader().GetDatHeader().c_str(), options->m_DATFileName).c_str();
00300         if(datHeader == "") 
00301         {
00302             return false;
00303         }
00304         else
00305         {
00306                 outFile.GetHeader().SetDatHeader(datHeader.c_str());
00307         }
00308     }
00309     else
00310     {
00311             outFile.GetHeader().SetDatHeader(inFile.GetHeader().GetDatHeader().c_str());
00312     }
00313         outFile.GetHeader().SetHeader(inFile.GetHeader().GetHeader().c_str());
00314 
00315     return true;
00316 }
00317 
00318 void CELConversionUtilities::SetCellMargin(CelFileData &inFile, CCELFileData &outFile, int defaultValue)
00319 {
00320         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00321         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(L"CellMargin", nvt))
00322         {
00323                 if (nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type)
00324                 {
00325                         outFile.GetHeader().SetMargin(nvt.GetValueInt32());
00326                 }
00327                 else if(nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType)
00328                 {
00329                         outFile.GetHeader().SetMargin(atoi(nvt.GetValueAscii().c_str()));
00330                 }
00331         }
00332         else
00333         {
00334                 outFile.GetHeader().SetMargin(defaultValue);
00335         }
00336 }
00337 
00338 void CELConversionUtilities::FindAndAddAlgorithmParameter(string name, string defaultValue, CelFileData &inFile, CCELFileData &outFile)
00339 {
00340         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00341         if (inFile.FindAlgorithmParameter(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(name), nvt))
00342         {
00343                 outFile.AddAlgorithmParameter(name.c_str(), StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(nvt.ToString()).c_str());
00344         }
00345         else
00346         {
00347                 outFile.AddAlgorithmParameter(name.c_str(), defaultValue.c_str());
00348         }
00349 }
